curriculums.name: Class A CDL Training Program
curriculums.description: Non-accredited vocational training for Class A Commercial Driver's License. Prepares students to operate combination vehicles (tractor-trailers) with a GVWR over 26,001 lbs. Includes classroom instruction, range training, and road practice.

curriculums.name: Class A CDL with Combination Vehicle Endorsement
curriculums.description: Non-accredited vocational training for Class A CDL with Doubles/Triples (T) endorsement. Prepares students to operate combination vehicles including double and triple trailers. Includes all Class A training plus specialized combination vehicle instruction.

curriculums.name: Class A CDL with Tanker Endorsement
curriculums.description: Non-accredited vocational training for Class A CDL with Tanker (N) endorsement. Prepares students to transport liquid or gaseous materials in bulk tanks. Includes all Class A training plus tanker safety, loading/unloading procedures, and hazmat awareness.

curriculums.name: Class B CDL Training Program
curriculums.description: Non-accredited vocational training for Class B Commercial Driver's License. Prepares students to operate single vehicles with a GVWR over 26,001 lbs, or tow vehicles under 10,000 lbs. Includes straight trucks, buses, and delivery vehicles.

curriculums.name: Class B CDL with Passenger Endorsement
curriculums.description: Non-accredited vocational training for Class B CDL with Passenger (P) endorsement. Prepares students to operate buses and passenger vehicles carrying 16 or more passengers. Includes all Class B training plus passenger safety, ADA compliance, and emergency procedures.
